message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $11,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is tempting, I can't let it go for less than $10,500. I'm confident it's a worthwhile investment for you at this price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $10,500 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $10,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
